txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from Óinsbridge. They have found the bridge to be overrun by the Taurogrim. The Taurogrim continue to be pushed from the Mirkwood and have begun taking lands such as the Thornholt!

'We cannot let the Taurogrim corruption to spread over Óinsbridge. We need the bridge to send supplies from Skarháld to Elderslade!'
Your mission is to destroy the Taurogrim corruption at Óinsbridge.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Óinsbridge.
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
You have been tasked with destroying the Taurogrim corruption that has spread over Óinsbridge.
Complete Mission: The Roots of Decay
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to Óinsbridge.'

'Well done! With much of the Taurogrim corruption reduced upon the bridge, we should be able to retake Óinsbridge, and resume sending supplies! I just hope the Taurogrim do not try this fool's errand again!'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
The Taurogrim have taken over Óinsbridge as their corruption spreads out past the Thornholt….\n\nYour mission is to destroy the Taurogrim corruption at Óinsbridge.
